mapper.insert: insert into chu_ku(deliver_id, deliver_date, customer_id, customer_name, book_owner_id, book_owner_name, deliver_man, deliver_contact_phone, book_name, revision, quantity, price, fixed_price, discount, discounted_price, crate_id, deliver_address, postcode, transportation, site_arrived, contact_person, contact_phone) values(#{deliver_id}, #{deliver_date}, #{customer_id}, #{customer_name}, #{book_owner_id}, #{book_owner_name}, #{deliver_man}, #{deliver_contact_phone}, #{book_name}, #{revision}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{fixed_price}, #{discount}, #{discounted_price}, #{crate_id}, #{deliver_address}, #{postcode}, #{transportation}, #{site_arrived}, #{contact_person}, #{contact_phone})
mapper.update: update chu_ku set deliver_date=#{deliver_date}, customer_id=#{customer_id}, customer_name=#{customer_name}, book_owner_id=#{book_owner_id}, book_owner_name=#{book_owner_name}, deliver_man=#{deliver_man}, deliver_contact_phone=#{deliver_contact_phone}, book_name=#{book_name}, revision=#{revision}, quantity=#{quantity}, price=#{price}, fixed_price=#{fixed_price}, discount=#{discount}, discounted_price=#{discounted_price}, crate_id=#{crate_id}, deliver_address=#{deliver_address}, postcode=#{postcode}, transportation=#{transportation}, site_arrived=#{site_arrived}, contact_person=#{contact_person}, contact_phone=#{contact_phone} where deliver_id=#{deliver_id}
mapper.select: select xuan_ti.id, type, year, season, book_name, sub_book_name, department, originator, gao_jian_source.content as gao_jian_source, chu_shen_comments.content as chu_shen_comments, xuan_ti_status.content as xuan_ti_status, ISBN from ((xuan_ti inner join gao_jian_source on xuan_ti.source=gao_jian_source.id) inner join chu_shen_comments on xuan_ti.first_comments=chu_shen_comments.id) inner join xuan_ti_status on xuan_ti.status=xuan_ti_status.id order by xuan_ti.id asc
